name: Solar Pearl
description: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon and pulses with a warm strength.

passiveDescription.0: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by <cryo>20%</cryo> for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>20%</cryo> for 6s.
passiveDescription.1: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by <cryo>25%</cryo> for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>25%</cryo> for 6s.
passiveDescription.2: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by <cryo>30%</cryo> for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>30%</cryo> for 6s.
passiveDescription.3: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by <cryo>35%</cryo> for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>35%</cryo> for 6s.
passiveDescription.4: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by <cryo>40%</cryo> for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>40%</cryo> for 6s.
